title: 关于VIPzero的bug 求大神
author: qq7726969
txt_content:
如题 
移除VIP玩家之后 玩家名称会变成某个OP的名称
求解
paypal:
  use: false
  username: username
  password: password
  signature: signature
  mode: 1
  mysql_log: false
logging:
  usekey: false
check_for_updates: true
case_sensitive_for_flatfile: false
key_length: 10
one_vip_change: false
usekey_global: false
rvip_unlisted: true
use_vault_for_permissions: false
check_time: 10
pagseguro:

default_group: default

replies.author: ProperSAMA
replies.txt_content:
qq7726969 发表于 2015-7-9 17:44
default不是默认么=-=
不是=-=
如果你设置了ess的话，输入/list就能看到玩家都在builder组里=-=

replies.author: qq7726969
replies.txt_content:
zzx19991105 发表于 2015-7-9 09:06
把default_group:default改成default_group:builder
builder不是建筑么

replies.author: ProperSAMA
replies.txt_content:
qq7726969 发表于 2015-7-9 10:24
builder不是建筑么
Builder是默认组=-=

replies.author: qq7726969
replies.txt_content:
zzx19991105 发表于 2015-7-9 17:34
Builder是默认组=-=
default不是默认么=-=
